author: p1ge0nh8er
content: Hi can anyone link me to documentation regarding the network layer for node communication?

author: atoulme
content:
hey everyone, I wanted to thank you all for the help along the way. We have learned a bunch from the various docs and members here. We have created a blog post with our experience putting together Geth with Splunk monitoring: https://medium.com/splunk-dlt/geth-hosting-with-splunk-62045c615ab4

Most importantly, we used the OpenTelemetry Collector to collect Geth information and hostmetrics in one pass. It all works really well.
